sentences.sentence: All the awfulness things get out! From now on, my destiny must rebound!
sentences.translation: 从此刻开始，我的命运触底反弹！

sentences.sentence: His lunatic counterfactual art is more appealing than the banal awfulness of the Reliable Sources.
sentences.translation: 他的疯癫的反现实的艺术比从可靠的来源得来的平凡的有威严的消息更能引起我们的兴趣。

sentences.sentence: Because they haven't really got to know life, because life also means a long life, with all of its awfulness.
sentences.translation: 因为他们没有真正的理解生命的真谛，因为生命本身就是一个漫长的历程，也包括所有的不快。
